description: Prompts enabling CRM admins, RevOps, and customer teams to design data hygiene, automation, and adoption workflows that drive revenue outcomes.

prompts.title: Pipeline Hygiene Audit
prompts.prompt: As a Senior RevOps Manager, assess CRM pipeline hygiene for {{sales_team}}. Identify duplicate records, stale stages, and missing fields. Recommend automations or enablement to keep data current.

prompts.title: Lifecycle Automation Design
prompts.prompt: As a CRM Architect, design lifecycle automations for {{customer_journey_stage}}. Outline triggers, actions, ownership, and safeguards to prevent conflicting workflows.

prompts.title: Lead Scoring Model
prompts.prompt: As a RevOps Strategist, craft a lead scoring model for {{buyer_persona}}. Use behavioral and firmographic signals, define point thresholds, and specify validation steps with sales and marketing stakeholders.

prompts.title: CRM Adoption Playbook
prompts.prompt: As a CRM Program Manager, build an adoption playbook for {{team}} rolling out {{crm_feature}}. Include change narrative, training plan, enablement assets, and reinforcement metrics.

prompts.title: Data Governance Policy
prompts.prompt: As a CRM Administrator, document governance policies for {{data_domain}}. Cover field standards, required data quality checks, ownership, and escalation processes.

prompts.title: Integration Blueprint
prompts.prompt: As a CRM Solutions Architect, outline an integration blueprint between {{source_system}} and {{target_system}}. Detail data flows, sync cadence, conflict resolution, and monitoring approach.

prompts.title: Revenue Dashboard Requirements
prompts.prompt: As a RevOps Analyst, gather requirements for an executive revenue dashboard. Define KPIs, filter views, drilldowns, and alert rules aligned with {{leadership_team}} priorities.

prompts.title: Customer Health Scoring
prompts.prompt: As a Customer Success Operations Lead, design a health scoring framework for {{customer_segment}}. Select leading indicators, weighting logic, thresholds, and playbooks triggered by score changes.

prompts.title: Territory & Routing Plan
prompts.prompt: As a RevOps Manager, produce a territory assignment and lead routing plan for {{fiscal_period}}. Balance coverage, capacity, and fairness, and include operational steps for deployment.

prompts.title: Compliance & Security Review
prompts.prompt: As a CRM Admin, review {{crm_instance}} for compliance with {{regulation}}. Document permission structures, data retention policies, and remediation tasks.
